title: how do I find group chat?
body: pretty much the topic: I'm having trouble finding  . . .any info at all about the groups I'm in, in the alpha client.

replies.body:
Do you mean clubs? That feature has been temporarily disabled:
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na
